channel.title: My First 'Entertaining' Java App (Sentence Maker)
channel.description:
Well, before I got internet, I was using Netbeans a bit to learn Java since my VB wouldn't work. Well, I made this mainly myself, only using Netbeans for the GUI (All it's useful for anyways?) and I wanted to see what other people thought of it. It made my cousin crack up on a few things, I don't see how though...
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?fjqdxu1zmdd]Download[/url]
Some things don't make sense, because I wasn't in the mood to update and re-jar.
~Lin

item.title: My First 'Entertaining' Java App (Sentence Maker)
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Frell:

Could not find the main class program will exit. Tried running through batch, nothing.

Include the jar in the classpath and then run the mainclass.
